Entries.Bad_2: I'm not feeling well. I should see Doctor Harriet.$2#$b#You might want to stay away, in case it's contagious.$2

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: You're working so hard, sweetie! This energy tonic from Doctor Harriet will help you get your energy back.[349]$3#$e#Have a wonderful day, my love!$1

Entries.funLeave_Olivia: I'm not feeling well. I should see Doctor Harriet.$2#$b#You might want to stay away, in case it's contagious.$2

Entries.Outdoor_Victor: I picked up an energy tonic from Doctor Harriet for you.$1#$b#This will energize your body so you can get more work done.[349]$1#$e#Have a splendid day!$3
Entries.Bad_4: I think I got sick last night. I feel nauseated. Don't touch me, @.$2#$e#I don't want to get you sick too! I'll pick up some medicine from Doctor Harriet today.$2

Entries.fall_Mon8: You're working so hard, sweetie! This energy tonic from Doctor Harriet will help you get your energy back.[349]$3#$e#Have a wonderful day!$1
Entries.winter_Sun: I feel as if I'm starting to get sick. This winter has been unusually cold.$2#$e#I need to pay a visit to Harriet. We're fortunate to have an experienced doctor in the valley.$0
Entries.winter_Sun8: Are you all right, @? You look a little pale.$6#$e#...Make sure you're taking good care of your health, sweetie. You might want to check in with Harriet.$6#$e#I wouldn't want anything to happen to you.$2

Entries.fall_Mon8: You're working so hard! This energy tonic from Doctor Harriet will help you get your energy back.[349]$3#$e#Have a wonderful day!$1
Entries.winter_Sun: I feel as if I'm starting to get sick. This winter has been unusually cold.$2#$e#I need to pay a visit to Harriet. We're fortunate to have an experienced doctor in the valley.$0
Entries.winter_Sun8: Are you all right, @? You look a little pale.$6#$e#...Make sure you're taking good care of your health. You might want to check in with Harriet.$6#$e#I wouldn't want anything to happen to you.$2

Entries.Hospital_5_17: Oh, hello. I'm picking up my medication from Doctor Harriet.$0

0/pause 200/textAboveHead Maru "A 'Lunzar Horizon' please!"/pause 900/textAboveHead Haley "Watch out!"/shake Haley 1250/pause 600/move Emily 0 0 2/pause 900/textAboveHead Emily "Okay, Maru!"/pause 500/move Emily 2 0 0/pause 400/textAboveHead Gus "Thanks, Harriet!"/pause 800/shake Alex 1500/textAboveHead Alex "Gah! I died..."/pause 700/shake Haley 500/pause 400/emote farmer 40 true/pause 300/textAboveHead Harvey "Thanks, Gus."/pause 1250/speak Olivia "@! Over here, dear!$1"/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 600/viewport move 1 0 5000 true/move farmer 6 0 0 true/pause 800/textAboveHead Victor "Haha!"/pause 2300/move Emily -1 0 0 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Lewis "Marnie! Haha!"/pause 200/shake Lewis 1250/pause 200/stopAnimation Olivia/move Olivia 0 0 2 true/speak Olivia "It's a full house at the saloon tonight. I don't think I've ever seen it this packed.$1"/pause 400/textAboveHead Caroline "Hahaha!"/shake Caroline 1000/pause 400/speak Olivia "Emily will take your order soon.$0#$b#I'll wave her down for you when she sees us.$1"/pause 200/move Emily 0 1 2/pause 300/textAboveHead Emily "Here, Maru!"/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 500/speak Olivia "I'm sampling a new brand of wine from Sunshine Vineyard. It came all this way from the Fern Islands.$3#$b#They never cease to amaze me!$1"/pause 400/textAboveHead Pam "Gus!!!"/shake Pam 750/pause 600/move Gus 0 0 3/emote Gus 8 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 0/speak Olivia "I strongly dislike beer. It tastes like moldy bread to me...$2#$b#I prefer dry red wine.$3"/pause 250/textAboveHead MarlonFay "Hmm... I see."/pause 300/move Gus -1 0 3 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Maru "Thank you!"/pause 250/speak Olivia "The life of a farmer seems very demanding. I sometimes catch a glimpse of you going about your days with great haste.$3#$b#Tell me... how do you do it?$6"/pause 300/emote farmer 40 true/pause 250/move Harvey 1 0 0 true/pause 500/textAboveHead Alex "!!!"/shake Alex 1000/pause 200/speak Olivia "Foraging and making food 'on-the-go'? My, my...$6#$b#If you ever require a home-cooked meal, don't hesitate to drop by my residence.$3"/pause 200/move Emily 4 0 1 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Gus "Coming up, Pam!"/pause 300/move Olivia 0 0 3 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 3/move Gus 2 0 0/move Gus 0 -1 0 true/speak Emily "Sorry, @! I've had my hands full tonight. There are so many people!$0"/pause 300/textAboveHead Pierre "Haha!"/shake Pierre 1000/pause 500/speak Emily "What would you like to drink?$1"/move Gus 0 1 2/move Gus -2 0 3 true/speak Emily "$q -1 null#*** ** **STARDROP SALOON COCKTAIL MENU** ** ***#$r -1 0 emily_event1#'SHOOTING COMET' - Ingredients: Whiskey, Lime Juice, Mint Leaves, Sugar#$r -1 0 emily_event2#'LUNAR HORIZON' - Ingredients: Gin, Sugar Syrup, Lime Juice, Sparkling Water#$r -1 0 emily_event3#'ROSETTE NEBULA' - Ingredients: Vodka, Cranberry Juice, Cointreau, Lime Juice#$r -1 0 emily_event4#'THE BIG BANG' - Ingredients: White Rum, Dark Rum, Orange Curacao, Orgeat Syrup, Lemon Juice#$r -1 0 emily_event5#'HAZY SUNRISE' - Ingredients: Orange Juice, Lemon Juice, Soda, Grenadine Syrup"/pause 250/textAboveHead Gus "Here, Pam!"/shake Haley 700/pause 300/speak Emily "I'll be right back with your drink, @!$0"/speed Emily 2/move Emily -4 0 3 true/pause 350/textAboveHead Marnie "Oh, I see!"/pause 500/textAboveHead Pam "Thanks!"/shake Pam 700/pause 350/move Olivia 0 0 2 true/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 0/pause 250/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 300/speak Olivia "Emily is a wonderful waitress. My favorite cocktail is the Rosette Nebula.$1#$b#I'm satisfied with my wine for tonight though.$6"/pause 300/textAboveHead Caroline "Haha!!"/shake Caroline 1000/pause 500/textAboveHead Wizard "It is time then..."/pause 500/shake Emily 500/pause 400/textAboveHead Sebastian "Try harder!"/pause 400/move Emily 0 1 2/move Emily 4 0 1 true/pause 800/move Gus 1 0 2 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 3/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Emily "Here you are, @! Enjoy!$1"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 200/move Emily 0 -1 0/move Emily -4 0 0 true/pause 400/move Olivia 0 0 2 true/pause 500/textAboveHead Lewis "Haha!!!"/shake Lewis 800/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 500/speak Olivia "I want to tell you about some of my family residing in the Gotoro Empire, dear...$3"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Olivia 50/stopMusic/pause 1000/end dialogue Olivia "I enjoyed chatting over a drink at the saloon with you.$3#$b#Perhaps we can arrange for that again in the future, dear.$1"

My, my...$6#$b#If you ever require a home-cooked meal, don't hesitate to drop by my residence.$3"/pause 200/move Emily 4 0 1 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Gus "Coming up, Pam!"/pause 300/move Olivia 0 0 3 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 3/move Gus 2 0 0/move Gus 0 -1 0 true/speak Emily "Sorry, @! I've had my hands full tonight. There are so many people!$0"/pause 300/textAboveHead Pierre "Haha!"/shake Pierre 1000/pause 500/speak Emily "What would you like to drink?$1"/move Gus 0 1 2/move Gus -2 0 3 true/speak Emily "$q -1 null#*** ** **STARDROP SALOON COCKTAIL MENU** ** ***#$r -1 0 emily_event1#'SHOOTING COMET' - Ingredients: Whiskey, Lime Juice, Mint Leaves, Sugar#$r -1 0 emily_event2#'LUNAR HORIZON' - Ingredients: Gin, Sugar Syrup, Lime Juice, Sparkling Water#$r -1 0 emily_event3#'ROSETTE NEBULA' - Ingredients: Vodka, Cranberry Juice, Cointreau, Lime Juice#$r -1 0 emily_event4#'THE BIG BANG' - Ingredients: White Rum, Dark Rum, Orange Curacao, Orgeat Syrup, Lemon Juice#$r -1 0 emily_event5#'HAZY SUNRISE' - Ingredients: Orange Juice, Lemon Juice, Soda, Grenadine Syrup"/pause 250/textAboveHead Gus "Here, Pam!"/shake Haley 700/pause 300/speak Emily "I'll be right back with your drink, @!$0"/speed Emily 2/move Emily -4 0 3 true/pause 350/textAboveHead Marnie "Oh, I see!"/pause 500/textAboveHead Pam "Thanks!"/shake Pam 700/pause 350/move Olivia 0 0 2 true/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 0/pause 250/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 300/speak Olivia "Emily is a wonderful waitress. My favorite cocktail is the Rosette Nebula.$1#$b#I'm satisfied with my wine for tonight though.$6"/pause 300/textAboveHead Caroline "Haha!!"/shake Caroline 1000/pause 500/textAboveHead Wizard "It is time then..."/pause 500/shake Emily 500/pause 400/textAboveHead Sebastian "Try harder!"/pause 400/move Emily 0 1 2/move Emily 4 0 1 true/pause 800/move Gus 1 0 2 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 3/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Emily "Here you are, @! Enjoy!$1"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 200/move Emily 0 -1 0/move Emily -4 0 0 true/pause 400/move Olivia 0 0 2 true/pause 500/textAboveHead Lewis "Haha!!!"/shake Lewis 800/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 500/speak Olivia "I want to tell you about some of my family residing in the Gotoro Empire, dear...$3"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Olivia 50/stopMusic/pause 1000/end dialogue Olivia "I enjoyed chatting over a drink at the saloon with you.$3#$b#Perhaps we can arrange for that again in the future, dear.$1"

Entries.jodi_event2: Thank you for the idea, @.$2#$b#I'll talk to Harriet about this. I'm sure she'll be happy to refer us to someone.$2

Entries.528013/f Harvey 2500/t 600 1700/n harvey: continue/-300 -300/Harvey -100 -100 0 farmer 90 72 1/skippable/viewport 90 72 true/viewport move 2 0 6000 true/move farmer 12 0 1 true/pause 3500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Custom_ShearwaterBridge/warp farmer 20 21/viewport 20 21 true/viewport move 2 0 6000 true/move farmer 12 0 1 true/pause 3500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/halt/changeLocation Custom_GrampletonFields_Small/playMusic playful/warp farmer 16 42/faceDirection farmer 1/warp Harvey 24 41/faceDirection Harvey 0/viewport 24 40 true/move farmer 8 0 0/pause 500/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/pause 200/faceDirection Harvey 2/pause 250/speak Harvey "There you are... just in time!$l"/faceDirection Harvey 0/jump Harvey/pause 800/speak Harvey "Look, here it comes!$8"/emote farmer 8/move Harvey -1 0 1/move farmer -2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/addTemporaryActor Marcello 16 32 25 19 2 true/positionOffset Marcello 36 558/animate Marcello false true 400 16 17/specificTemporarySprite marcelloLand/null/pause 1000/stopAnimation Marcello/pause 500/message "Marcello's Balloon Rentals at your service!"/pause 1000/positionOffset Marcello -4 0/pause 20/positionOffset Marcello -4 0/pause 20/positionOffset Marcello -4 0/pause 20/positionOffset Marcello -4 0/pause 20/positionOffset Marcello -4 0/pause 20/positionOffset Marcello -4 0/pause 20/positionOffset Marcello -4 0/pause 20/positionOffset Marcello -4 0/pause 20/positionOffset Marcello -4 0/pause 20/jump Marcello 12/move Marcello 0 3 3/move Marcello -2 0 0/faceDirection Harvey 2/faceDirection farmer 2/message "Marcello: It's all yours for two hours."/faceDirection Marcello 3/faceDirection Marcello 3/message "Marcello: Now... I was told there's a saloon back in town?"/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/warp Marcello -100 -100/viewport 24 40 true/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Harvey 3/pause 500/speak Harvey "I saw an ad in the paper for these balloon rides and I knew I had to surprise you with one."/pause 500/emote Harvey 40/pause 300/speak Harvey "I am afraid of heights...$s#$b#But I'm determined to not let that stop me from doing what I want... and experiencing this with you.$l#$b#I'll try not to get scared."/pause 500/speak Harvey "Okay... you first.$l"/pause 400/move farmer 0 1 1/faceDirection Harvey 1/move farmer 3 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/jump farmer 14/move farmer 0 -1 2/move Harvey 0 1 1/move Harvey 3 0 0/move Harvey 0 -1 0/jump Harvey 14/move Harvey 0 -1 2/pause Harvey false true 100 12 13 14 15/positionOffset Harvey -4 2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -4 2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -4 2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -4 2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -4 2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -4 2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -4 2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -4 2/pause 30/stopAnimation Harvey/showFrame Harvey 31/positionOffset Harvey -4 0/playSound fishSlap/eyes 1 -2000/pause 2000/speak Harvey "We... We're up so high... *gulp*$8"/shake Harvey 2000/pause 800/speak Harvey "I wanted to impress you with this... but look at me. I'm a trembling coward.$7"/emote Harvey 28/pause 500/speak Harvey "Well, you've got more than enough courage to make up for me, @... that's... that's part of why I like you.$11"/pause 1000/speak Harvey "Okay, I'm going to open my eyes and look down... don't let go of my hand.$4"/pause 800/positionOffset Harvey 4 -2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey 4 -2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey 4 -2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey 4 -2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey 4 0/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey 4 0/pause 30/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Harvey 0/pause 500/showFrame Harvey 33/pause 500/shake Harvey 4000/pause 500/showFrame Harvey 30/pause 2000/showFrame Harvey 33/pause 3500/speak Harvey "I... I think I can do it now.$8"/specificTemporarySprite balloonBirds/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 3000/faceDirection Harvey 1/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 16 true/emote Harvey 16/pause 4000/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Harvey 2/pause 10000/speak Harvey "Hey, this is incredible! I think I can see Mayor Lewis standing in the town square!$h"/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 3000/speak Harvey "Oh dear... our time's almost up.$s"/pause 400/faceDirection Harvey 3/faceDirection farmer 1/playMusic none/pause 500/speak Harvey "Um... @? We've known each other for a while now and... I... er...$11"/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 400/faceDirection Harvey 2/pause 500/faceDirection Harvey 3/speak Harvey "...$11"/specificTemporarySprite balloonBirds 2/pause 1000/showFrame Harvey 31/pause 500/showFrame 101/positionOffset Harvey -1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -1 -2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -1 -2/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Harvey -1 0/pause 30/pause 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 2000/speak Harvey "Whoops... Our time was up half an hour ago. We'd better touch down.$l"/pause 2000/end dialogue Harvey "I haven't had such a wonderful day for as long as I can remember.$l"

Entries.1000003/f Harvey 1250/k 528052/p Harvey/: jaunty/-500 -500/farmer 10 12 0 Harvey 2 5 0/pause 300/skippable/viewport 6 7 true/move farmer 0 -2 3/textAboveHead Harvey "AE-134.01 capsules..."/move farmer -5 0 0/doAction 5 9/pause 200/textAboveHead Harvey "150mg and 200mg..."/move farmer 0 -5 3/move farmer -1 0 3/emote farmer 8/speak Harvey "Twenty 250mg capsules. Take one capsule twice a day with food, after breakfast and dinner. Avoid alcohol. Keep refrigerated...$0"/pause 500/move Harvey 0 0 1/emote Harvey 16/speak Harvey "Oh, @! I didn't see you step in!$8"/pause 500/move Harvey 0 0 0/pause 1000/move Harvey 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Harvey "I'm filling a prescription for a patient in Grampleton.$1#$b#Some people in rural areas around the city rely on this clinic.#0#$b#Did you hear me talking to myself? That information was highly confidential.$5"/pause 100/question fork0 "You need to keep that information to yourself.#I won't tell anyone.#Why would I keep it a secret?"/fork 1000003_KeepSecret/pause 500/speak Harvey "...@, I thought you understood how seriously I take my job. I'm disappointed in you.$2"/pause 1000/move Harvey 0 0 0/pause 500/speak Harvey "I have work to do. Please shut the door on your way out...$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Harvey -250/end dialogue Harvey "...$5#$e#%Harriet looks disappointed in me."

Entries.1000017_EverythingOkay: pause 1000/emote George 28/pause 1400/speak George "...I got bad news from Harvey.$2"/pause 800/move George 0 0 2/pause 500/playMusic echos/pause 500/animate George false true 999999 16/pause 1500/speak George "I've had more pain than usual in the mornings, but I didn't think it was a big deal.$2#$b#Evelyn forced me to visit the clinic a few days ago. Harriet found cysts that are the result of... cancer.$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 60/pause 1200/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 650/speak George "I told Evelyn and Alexis. They didn't take the news too well...$2#$b#Evelyn said we'll find the best surgeon in the Ferngill Republic to remove them.$2#$b#Harriet also recommended some specialists in Zuzu City.$2"/pause 1500/speak George "To tell you the truth, I'm scared, @.$2#$b#In times like these, I can only find solace in praying to Yoba.$2"/pause 1000/stopAnimation George/pause 650/move George 0 0 0/pause 1300/speak George "Yoba has helped me before when I asked for it. I'm confident Yoba will lend me the power to get through this.$0"/pause 200/question fork1 "#You have friends and family here to support you.#Praying won't make it better."/fork 1000017_GetThroughThis/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 600/shake George 1000/emote George 28/pause 500/move George 0 0 3/pause 500/speak George "...Leave.$2#$b#Talking to you will surely not help.$2"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship George -1000/end dialogue George "Don't dictate what I should and shouldn't believe in, @.$0#$b#Especially when I just told you I'm very sick...$2"

pause 1000/emote George 28/pause 1400/speak George "...I got bad news from Harvey.$2"/pause 800/move George 0 0 2/pause 500/playMusic echos/pause 500/animate George false true 999999 16/pause 1500/speak George "I've had more pain than usual in the mornings, but I didn't think it was a big deal.$2#$b#Evelyn forced me to visit the clinic a few days ago. Harriet found cysts that are the result of... cancer.$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 60/pause 1200/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 650/speak George "I told Evelyn and Alexis. They didn't take the news too well...$2#$b#Evelyn said we'll find the best surgeon in the Ferngill Republic to remove them.$2#$b#Harriet also recommended some specialists in Zuzu City.$2"/pause 1500/speak George "To tell you the truth, I'm scared, @.$2#$b#In times like these, I can only find solace in praying to Yoba.$2"/pause 1000/stopAnimation George/pause 650/move George 0 0 0/pause 1300/speak George "Yoba has helped me before when I asked for it. I'm confident Yoba will lend me the power to get through this.$0"/pause 200/question fork1 "#You have friends and family here to support you.#Praying won't make it better."/fork 1000017_GetThroughThis/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 600/shake George 1000/emote George 28/pause 500/move George 0 0 3/pause 500/speak George "...Leave.$2#$b#Talking to you will surely not help.$2"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship George -1000/end dialogue George "Don't dictate what I should and shouldn't believe in, @.$0#$b#Especially when I just told you I'm very sick...$2"

Entries.1000018_TalkToMe: pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1200/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 800/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#It's Kent...$2#$b#I love him and I'm so glad he's finally home but...$2"/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1100/speak Jodi "Ever since he got back, he just... he hasn't been the same person.$2#$b#He never laughs anymore. He won't talk to me. He practically ignores Vincent and Sam. He hardly eats any food. We haven't had-$2"/pause 200/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Jodi 12/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 450/speak Jodi "He's opened up a little about some of the horrors he experienced. The things he's seen. The friends he lost. What he went through when he was captured...$2#$b#Yesterday, Vincent was watching a cartoon and he accidently pushed a button on the remote and made the TV go static.$2#$b#Kent immediately fell to the floor and put his hands over his head...$2#$b#Later, he told me that at his base, the TV screens would go to static right before an alarm sounded. When they heard it, everyone knew they had to take cover.$2"/pause 200/emote Jodi 28/pause 200/speak Jodi "Harriet gave him some medicine that should help with the symptoms of PTSD.$2#$b#I can't tell if it's made a difference.$2"/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 500/textAboveHead Jodi "*sniff*..."/shake Jodi 1000/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 700/speak Jodi "He's hurting so much, and I don't know how to help him, @. I feel helpless...$2"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 jodi_event1#Kent needs you now more than ever.#$r -1 0 jodi_event2#You might want to look for a therapist in Zuzu or Pine-Mesa City."/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 1000/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 600/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#I'm sorry, @. I had all of that bottled up, and I might have said too much.$2#$b#Thank you for listening to me. You, Olivia, and Caroline are my closest friends, and you're always there for me$2."/pause 1500/speak Jodi "I hope one day I can be there for you, too.$0"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 jodi_event3#If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to ask.#$r -1 0 jodi_event4#With a combined effort, there's nothing you two can't accomplish."/pause 1700/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Jodi "I'll follow the advice you gave me.$1"/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 550/speak Jodi "I need to finish watering these flowers, okay? I'll talk to you later. Thank you again.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Jodi "Thank you for talking to me earlier, @. I know what to do to help Kent. I think things will be better soon.$0"

Entries.CommunityDay_Demetrius: Harriet's been telling me about some of the science behind healthy food.$0#$b#It's not my usual field, but I can definitely see the importance.$1

Entries.CommunityDay_Maru: I help Harriet a little more often in the winter.$0#$b#Lots of people coming in with colds...$2#$b#Make sure you bundle up.$3

Entries.CommunityDay_Shane: Huh.. I'm learning a lot from Harriet, actually. Can probably use some of this on the ranch.$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Shane_Married: Harriet's real talkative tonight. Want to come distract me?$1
